title: RssTabs.com
description: Build your own AI news assistant in RssTabs. Smart, personalized, and efficient.
description-2: Use cutting-edge AI technology to customize the latest headlines just for you.
get-free-description-2: Start using the free version of RssTabs without a credit card

features.description-2: Use cutting-edge AI technology to customize the latest headlines just for you.
features.aggregation-description: RssTabs collects thousands of popular RSS sources, providing a one-stop reading experience.
features.language-description: RssTabs supports multiple national languages, seamlessly switching the reading experience.
features.bookmark-description: One-click save interesting content for easy review at any time.
features.search-description: RssTabs is equipped with a built-in search engine, and you can also freely configure it to provide a fast and accurate search experience.
features.layout-description: RssTabs allows you to flexibly adjust the page layout and configure it according to your preferences to create a personalized reading interface.
features.polyfeed-description: RssTabs supports multi-source aggregation, which we call polyfeed. You can freely add and manage multiple RSS sources to create your own information stream with AI personalized customization.

evaluate.description-2: Let's see what our users have to say about their experience with RssTabs.

hot-feeds.description-2: As of today, RssTabs has collected thousands of hot RSS feeds, and more are coming.
